articles.title: Indian stock market: 10 key things that changed for market overnight - Gift Nifty, US inflation to rally in tech stocks | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Indian stock market: Gift Nifty was trading around the 22,675 level, a discount of nearly 130 points from the Nifty futures’ Wednesday’s close, indicating a gap-down start for the Indian stock market indices.
articles.content: Indian stock market: The domestic equity market is expected to open lower on Friday following mixed global market cues. Asian markets traded mixed while the US stocks ended mostly higher overnight af… [+5736 chars]

articles.author: Sean O'Kane
articles.title: Ford’s hands-free BlueCruise system was active before fatal Texas crash - TechCrunch
articles.description: It's the first known fatality resulting from a crash involving the use of BlueCruise, which Ford first announced in 2021.
articles.content: The driver of a Mustang Mach-E who crashed into a stationary car in Texas in February was using Ford’s hands-free driver-assistance system, BlueCruise, according to data obtained by the National Tran… [+2321 chars]

articles.author: Dylan Sloan
articles.title: Meta and Google announce new in-house AI chips, creating a “trillion-dollar question” for Nvidia - Fortune
articles.description: Nvidia still dominates the AI hardware sector, but the potential success of Big Tech companies’ native chips poses a threat.
articles.content: Hardware is emerging as a key AI growth area. For Big Tech companies with the money and talent to do so, developing in-house chips helps reduce dependence on outside designers such as Nvidia and Inte… [+5628 chars]
